definition: dry measure for grain equal to ten dou 斗/ten pecks/one hundred liters
rock/stone/stone inscription/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]

sentences.english: Tin in the deposits occurred mainly as cassiterite.
In addition to cassiterite and stannite, galena also contains a high amount of tin.
sentences.chinese: 除錫石和黃錫礦外，方鉛礦也含有較高的錫。

sentences.english: The mineralization of cassiterite-quartz vein is the main type of tin deposit in this district.
sentences.chinese: 提出錫石石英脈型礦化爲本區主要錫礦類型。

sentences.english: Cassiterite is also predominart in the deposits.
sentences.chinese: 礦牀中錫也以錫石爲主。
